short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: House research augmentations toolset for Redfin.com and Zillow.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for browsing houses on Redfin.com and Zillow.com.

The extension gives you extra links to "background check" the house, including criminal map, sex offender info from Department of Justice, High voltage transmission line map etc. These help you discover the metrics not found on Redfin/Zillow. 

On the top right there is a link to view the latest real estate news per state.

It also lets user write comments/reviews about the house. And you are more than welcome to leave yours. House hunting should go beyond cold statistics and metrics.

No registration or password required. 

Happy house hunting.
